attributes.action: Forbid the payment of any compensation to Bernard Matthews.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It would appear that the source of 'bird flu' came from birds imported by the firm themselves.
That they should now receive payment for other birds slaughtered to prevent the spread of it, beggars belief.
They should be heavily fined for importing diseased animals and thereby putting the whole country at risk.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
